text: Chris Elder (born 1992) is a rugby union player for Yorkshire Carnegie having played for London Welsh and formerly for England under 18s, Wasps, Esher and Plymouth Albion.http://www.london- welsh.co.uk/index.php?mod=rugby_squad&id;=146 ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:English rugby union players Category:Leeds Tykes players Category:London Welsh RFC players Category:Wasps RFC players Category:Esher RFC players Category:Plymouth Albion R.F.C. players
title: Chris Elder (rugby union)
